nodes.text: Star Wars: Episode I Incredible Cross-Sections

Star Wars: Episode I Incredible Cross-Sections is the second installment of the Incredible Cross-Sections series of reference books published by Dorling Kindersley on May 10, 1999. Written by David West Reynolds and illustrated by Hans Jenssen and Richard Chasemore, the book provides in-depth cross-sections and illustrations of over a dozen starships and vehicles from the film Star Wars: Episode I The Phantom Menace, including the Consular-class cruiser, tribubble bongo, Armored Assault Tank, and Lucrehulk-class Droid Control Ship. The book's content was later republished in 2007 as part of Star Wars: Complete Cross-Sections, a compilation of the entire Cross-Sections series.
